channel.title: My webcliet, Hangs at Connecting to server. repp++
channel.description:
I made a webclient, and it works fine in webclient ready version.
but after jarring it, and put it on my website it freezes at "Connecting to server, Please wait"
i can see the items in my inventory but the playng screen just wont come up.
Already tryed redownloading cache and stuff and testing on some other laptops.
Repping for help

item.title: My webcliet, Hangs at Connecting to server. repp++

ill make it for you team viewer information?
